data.title: Superstudio from Kaiber
data.description: A playground for accelerating imagination. Superstudio brings together creative AI tools, image, audio, and video models on an infinite canvas.

A playground for accelerating imagination.

Stability

One canvas. Infinite potential.
-------------------------------

Superstudio is your space to explore, ideate, and generate your videos and images all on one infinite canvas.

Whether you’re building dynamic workflows or training custom models, Superstudio empowers you to become the artist you were meant to be—no matter the medium

[Start Creating](https://kaiber.ai/superstudio/canvas/)

![Image 48: web illustration bingideas new](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/web-illustration-bingideas-new.avif)

### Bring all of your ideas.

Meet Kiko—your creative companion in Superstudio. Share your ideas, aspirations, and images with her. Kiko can connect the dots and bring your vision to life.

Early access available to subscribers.

### Go with the flow.

Add a Flow to your Superstudio canvas,  or mix and match Elements to craft your own.

With a growing library of new Flows from Kaiber, Luma, Topaz, Stable Diffusion, Runway, AudioShake (and more) all the creative possibilities are at your fingertips—all in one place.

![Image 50: Website Illustration GoFlow png](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/Website_Illustration_GoFlow-png.avif)

![Image 52: Website Illustration Curate 1 png](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/Website_Illustration_Curate-1-png.avif)

### Curate your imagination.

Group all your generations into Collections,  
turning individual pieces into cohesive, unified worlds.

Collections connect to Flows, and move seamlessly across Canvases.

Connect your ideas.
-------------------

You can link Flows and Collections to transform your canvas into your very own creative mind map, where ideas flow and grow effortlessly.

![Image 54: Website Illustration Connect png](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/Website_Illustration_Connect-png.avif)

Co-create in Superstudio:   
where you can build your own creative universe.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Image 56: Website Illustration Curate png](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/Website_Illustration_Curate-png.avif)

### Make your own Custom Models

Train your own custom models with ModelMaker, capturing your unique style, aura, and artistic energy.

### Bring your unique artistic vision to life—then take your ideas even further.

Combine custom models with Flows like Image Lab to expand your ideas into boundless, best-in-class creative visuals—all in your own aesthetic blueprint.

![Image 58: Frame 1000001925 png](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/Frame-1000001925-png.avif)

![Image 60: jumpv2 16 png](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/jumpv2-16-png.avif)

Join Superstudio
----------------

Pay as you go, or discover the perfect subscription to step up your creativity.

[Sign Up](http://kaiber.ai/register)

![Image 62: LabsLogo](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/LabsLogo.svg)

See it in Labs.  
Make it in Superstudio.
-----------------------------------------

Kaiber Labs invents and test-drives new tools and technology empowered by world-class creativity and cutting edge research to bring visionary projects to life.

![Image 64: yaeji](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/yaeji.webp)

### Weirdcore x Boiler Room

Labs co-produced animations for Yaeji’s New York headlining set at Boiler Room festival with visual artist Weirdcore.

![Image 66: ronjafman 1](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/ronjafman-1.webp)

### Jon Rafman x Praying

Labs collaborated with artist Jon Rafman to create visuals for a Live From Earth rave hosted with Praying.

![Image 68: grimes homepage](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/grimes-homepage.webp)

### Grimes

Labs developed models for the visionary artist Grimes ahead of her 2024 Coachella set.

Have a collaboration in mind? Tell us what you’re thinking and we’ll reach out if its a fit.

[Get In Touch](mailto:labs@kaiber.ai)

![Image 70: Union](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/Union.svg)

Artists are leading the creative revolution with Kaiber.
--------------------------------------------------------

Since 2023, we’ve opened up endless creative possibilities with our Al tools, helping artists worldwide turn their ideas into reality. Our team of artists, researchers, and technologists build products and experiences that tap into the creative potential of AI.

![Image 72: lost mv](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/lost-mv-1024x583.webp)

[Learn about Kaiber](https://www.kaiber.ai/about/)

[![Image 74](https://www.kaiber.ai/wp-content/uploads/KMark.svg)](https://www.kaiber.ai/superstudio/)
